cankered adjective
(TREE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
biology
  specialized a cankered tree or fruit is affected by the canker disease: The orchard had become cankered and unproductive. cankered apples

cankered adjective

literary evil, unhealthy, or decayed: The evil cannot be purged from their cankered hearts.
